column4: my XFS main partition crashed. It's telling me that it can't read the superblock. Is there a solution to this or did i lose all the data?
can you mount it from the ubuntu livecd
no i cannot. That's the point where it tells me it can't read the superblock.
found out what went wrong .... or well, more like the solution. had to destroy the old log data and then repair it. Apparently some files got freaked out causing it to fail.
